attributes.action: decide which train we should catch?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Difficult, Mike, Phil and I intend to travel by train to the Bristol Beer Festival on Friday 20th March 2009, should we catch an early one and guarantee seats, or a later one and risk standing..?
If your in favour of the early one vote, if not we will deduct the votes from the total UK population and decide which option to go for.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
